DOC.brief_summary: Characterize Masimo noninvasive technology in spot check reading on subjects and make comparison to invasive blood sampling tested on reference analyzers.
DOC.brief_title: Pulse CO-Oximetry Noninvasive Monitoring and Laboratory Measurements of Subject Blood Samples
DOC.detailed_description: Noninvasive readings from subjects done according to manufacturer's directions of use compared to simultaneously derived blood samples measured on in vitro analyzers
DOC.criteria: Male or female of any age â‰¥ 3 kg. Subjects may include healthy volunteers, outpatient or inpatient populations Subjects with skin abnormalities at the planned application sites that may interfere with sensor application or transillumination of the site, such as burns, scar tissue, nail polish, acrylic nails, infections, etc. Subjects deemed not suitable for study at the discretion of the investigator
